projects.name: Home Assistant — Advanced IoT Setup
projects.summary: Production‑like Home Assistant deployment with Docker; advanced automations for security and daily routines; Frigate‑based camera analytics (face/person/object detection) and event‑driven actions.

automations_examples: Face/person detection → trigger lights, send mobile notifications with snapshot & privacy redaction.
Geo‑fencing (arrival/departure) → arm/disarm security scenes, adjust climate and lighting.
Nighttime perimeter mode → enhance camera sensitivity; silence non‑critical alerts; record to separate retention bucket.
Package detection at door → TTS announcement + short‑term lock camera PTZ preset.
security_notes: Network segmentation for IoT VLAN; limited ingress; HA behind reverse proxy.
Secret management via .env / Vault (planned); audit logs for automations.

faq.q: What is Avi’s expertise in AI?
faq.a: Designing AI‑driven apps with agentic patterns (MCP) and RAG. Building microservices that let LLMs orchestrate tools safely, with telemetry and guardrails.
ETL architecture, hands‑on automation, technical leadership, and turning ambiguous goals into robust systems.
LangGraph & AutoGen for multi‑step planning, LoRA for local models, and better observability for agentic workflows.
